name: Battlestations: Pacific
description:
Battlestations: Pacific is an action, strategy and simulation game developed by Feral Interactive and Eidos Hungary. It came out on 12-05-2009. Feral Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Battlestations: Pacific is available on PC and macOS. You can purchase the game on App Store.
It was scored by David Kates and Richard Jacques.
